title: RPT-Driverless buses, platoons of trucks to shape Singapore's transport future
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
SINGAPORE, Oct 12 (Reuters) - Singapore unveiled its public transport future on Monday, and it was a vision of passengers commuting in drive...
